title: Horror Story (2013) 300mb HD
description:
Horror Story is a Bollywood dramatic horror film written by Vikram Bhatt and directed by Ayush Raina.[2] The film stars Ravish Desai, Hasan Zaidi, and features the Bollywood movie debut of television actor Karan Kundra.[3] The film is slated to release on September 13, 2013.[4] The plot revolves around a night spent by seven youngsters at a haunted hotel,The film received positive reviews and succeed at the box office.[5] and sequels are already being planned.[6]




Cast[edit]

Karan Kundra as Neel
Nishant Malkani as Achint
Ravish Desai as Maghesh
Hasan Zaidi as Samrat
Aparna Bajpai as Maggie
Radhika Menon as Neena
Nandini Vaid as Sonia
